import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';

Once you have [created your account](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx),
you can start using the IOTA SDK for value transactions. Since these examples target the testnet, you can request funds
using the `request_funds_from_faucet` function.

<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request_funds.rs#L25-L30
```

</div>

2. Get the wallet's [`Bech32Address`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/bech32/struct.Bech32Address.html)
 by calling the [`Wallet.address()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.address)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request_funds.rs#L33
```

</div>

3. Request funds to the `FAUCET_URL` you defined in the `.env` file by calling the [`Client::utils::request_funds_from_faucet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/client/utils/fn.request_funds_from_faucet.html) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request_funds.rs#L39
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request-funds.ts#L24-L26
```

</div>

2. Retrieve the wallet's [`Address`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Address/) by calling the
   [`Wallet.address()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#address) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request-funds.ts#L28
```

</div>

3. Instantiate a [`Client`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Client/) by calling the [`wallet.getClient()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#getclient) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request-funds.ts#L31
```

</div>

3. Request funds to the `FAUCET_URL` you defined in the `.env` file by calling the [`Client.requestFundsFromFaucet`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Client.md#requestfundsfromfaucet) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request-funds.ts#L32-L35
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request_funds.py#L14
```

</div>

2. Retrieve the wallet's [`Address`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/address/) by calling the
[`Wallet.address()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#address) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request_funds.py#L16
```

</div>

3. Instantiate a [`Client`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/client/) by calling the [`Wallet.get_client()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#get_client) function
    and request funds to the `FAUCET_URL` you defined in the `.env` file by calling the [`Client.request_funds_from_faucet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/client/_utils/#request_funds_from_faucet)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/request_funds.py#L19
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
rms1qpjt6zr7rfvl27le5xjcv0qhr90l92wtm6eu6v6jhtgvrjp7mwufq6nqxn8
{"address":"rms1qpjt6zr7rfvl27le5xjcv0qhr90l92wtm6eu6v6jhtgvrjp7mwufq6nqxn8","waitingRequests":11}
```
